luggage.title: Luggage 3D Configurator
luggage.content:
Project Overview

Interactive 3D product configurator allowing customers to customize luggage bands, colors, and features in real-time.

Key Features:

  • Real-time 3D customization
  • Multiple color options
  • Band material selection
  • 360-degree product view
  • Mobile-optimized experience

Results:

  • 40% increase in engagement
  • 25% boost in conversions
  • 60% reduction in returns

skincare.title: Skincare D2C Platform
skincare.content:
Project Overview

Complete D2C e-commerce platform with personalized skincare recommendations and subscription management.

Key Features:

  • Skin analysis quiz
  • Personalized product recommendations
  • Subscription management
  • Customer portal
  • Automated email marketing

Results:

  • 300% increase in online sales
  • 85% customer retention rate
  • 50% growth in subscription base

automation.title: Business Automation Suite
automation.content:
Project Overview

Comprehensive automation suite streamlining business processes, reducing manual work, and providing actionable analytics.

Key Features:

  • Automated workflows
  • Custom triggers and actions
  • Integration with third-party tools
  • Real-time analytics
  • Role-based access

Results:

  • 70% reduction in manual tasks
  • Improved operational efficiency
  • Enhanced data-driven decisions

furniture-ar.title: Furniture AR Viewer
furniture-ar.content:
Project Overview

AR application enabling users to visualize furniture in their own environment before purchase.

Key Features:

  • AR placement of 3D models
  • Scale and rotate furniture
  • Room lighting adaptation
  • Mobile and web support

Results:

  • 50% reduction in product returns
  • Increased customer confidence

fashion-d2c.title: Fashion D2C Store
fashion-d2c.content:
Project Overview

A modern D2C e-commerce platform for a fashion brand, featuring seamless shopping and personalized recommendations.

Key Features:

  • Personalized product feeds
  • Wishlist and quick buy
  • Integrated payment gateways
  • Mobile-first design

Results:

  • 200% increase in sales
  • High customer satisfaction

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.content:
Project Overview

Custom analytics dashboard providing real-time insights and visualizations for business KPIs.

Key Features:

  • Real-time data sync
  • Customizable widgets
  • Exportable reports
  • Role-based dashboards

Results:

  • Faster decision making
  • Improved business visibility
